name: Click the Music
description:
Click the Music is a rhythm-based music game. Main features:

  • 45+ minutes of original music grouped into several chapters: Beats, Melody, Ambient, Hardcore and Chiptune
  • Minimalistic flat design with tons of animations
  • Lots of upgrades that will help you along the way, including money multipliers, increasing time window in which the click will be registered, hints when to hit notes and much more
  • Visual shaders that are synced to the music

I will keep updating the game for further balancing, fixing bugs or just polishing it a bit more.

Click the Music is available only on Windows right now, but I plan to release it for Linux and Mac as well.

If you find any bugs or can't install it, reach me at spacecash@mail.ru or @lion123dev
